alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 11:25PM EDT until July 24 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN SAGINAW...SHIAWASSEE AND NORTHWESTERN LIVINGSTON COUNTIES... At 1124 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Marion Springs to near Elsie to near East Lansing to near Mason, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Owosso, Perry, Oakley and Henderson around 1135 PM EDT. Chesaning, Corunna and Morrice around 1140 PM EDT. New Lothrop and Bancroft around 1145 PM EDT. Fowlerville, Cohoctah and Lennon around 1150 PM EDT. Byron and Oak Grove around 1155 PM EDT. Howell around 1200 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Brant, Parkers Corners, Juddville, Fenmore, Layton Corners, Bennington, Conway Township, Shaftsburg, Carland and Vernon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
